alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bladen and central Robeson Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elrod, or 12 miles south of Red Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Elizabethtown, Pembroke, Bladenboro, Rowland, Bladen Community College, Butters, Hestertown, Buie, Robeson Community College, White Oak, Elrod, Smiths, Howellsville, Abbottsburg, Tolarsville, Duart, Ruskin, Barker Ten Mile, and Purvis. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 5 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
